email-well-sent: If email is valid, a reset password email has been sent
error-creating-user: An error occurred while creating user, email might be already used.
error-fetching-user: An error occurred while fetching user.
error-sending-email: An error occurred while sending a reset password email
error-sign-in: Check your internet connection or email/password might be invalid
error-sign-in-google: An error occurred while signing in with Google
error-sign-out: An error occurred while signing out
error-sign-up: An error occurred while signing up. This email might be used already
sign-in-again: Your session expired, please sign in again.
